text: Ko onon yo gomɗimɓe,njottiigu farlaama e mo'on:dimo sabu dimo, jeyaaɗo sabu jeyaaɗo,deyel sabu deyel.Kala ya'fanaaɗo goɗɗum e musiɗɗo makko,ko jokkitirogol no moƴƴiri tottira e makko no moƴƴiri.Ɗum ɗoo ko hoynaneede immorde e Joomi mo'on e yurmeende.Kala on jaggituɗo ɓaawo ɗu'um,no woodani mo lepte muusuɗe
